ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And such fruits as they fancy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: they will also go about them with the fruits of which they may choose,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Also, they will be served with the fruits of their choice
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And fruits that they may like.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And with fruit that they may choose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And fruits such as they choose,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and such fruits as they shall choose,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: along with fruits of their choice;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And with fruit from that which they choose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and such fruits as they prefer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And with fruits, any that they may select:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And fruit; that they may choose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: with fruits of their own choice
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And fruit of what they select
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:20] and such fruits as they prefer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And fruit) different kinds of fruit (that they prefer) that they desire.
